website_summaries.verdict: A unique alternative to traditional body paints that are easy to apply, though they aren't ideal for those who want full coverage and a finish that dries quickly and thoroughly.
pros: Contains eight bright colors in stick form
Contains zinc oxide, which provides some protection in the sun
cons: Consistency is sticky, and though colors are prone to smearing, they are difficult to wash off completely

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids, not fun for parents and 2 out of 8 broken
customer_reviews.text: Kids wanted this for Jr Guards program as all the other participants recommended these. 2 out of 8 were broken and would not come out of the tube (same concept as chapstick/glue sticks/lipsticks). The bottom just spins and spins and the stick does not come out. One stick was actually missing the bottom piece that makes it turn. Color comes of on clothes and suits, but not off skin. while it's a fun item for the kids, as a parent I would advise against it.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of Twins

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My boys have very long eye lashes and can not stand for water to get in there eyes so as you can imagine when we are at the beach and they are playing in the water they are constantly wiping their eyes so after years of coming home from beach trips with little red stripes on their faces from wiping the sunscreen off I found these. I use the sticks to get the spots under their eyes so that I can see when they wipe it off and need to reapply. The kids don't mind it because they think it's fun to have all the different colors on their faces.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! My daughters love these. We apply their "decorations" over our regular face sunscreen so I can't speak to it's sun protection. We mostly use it to make sure they aren't wiping their sunscreen off- we had a small disaster at the beach last month - sunburnt racoons eyes! I haven't had an issue with staining, even on my snow-white fair 3 year old. I wipe off what I can then spread on a layer of CeraVe hydrating cleanser and use a soft wash cloth to get the rest off- no issue even with the darkest colors. Also we only leave it on for about 2 hours max, wash their faces and reapply.
customer_reviews.author: Katie V.

customer_reviews.title: Good Color, Does Stain
customer_reviews.text: We got these for "war paint" at our summer camp and gave every team a color. The colors showed up very well, but they did stain the faces... some parents requested no face paint on day 2 and moving forward. But that's part of camp and some people do not prefer that anyways. It went on very smoothly and stayed put through all the sweat! Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke W.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy application
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these after leaving my entire pack of Zinka at a campsite. These are cheaper and come with more in a pack. My kids love to put this on over a regular application of sunscreen to the face. It helps with the trouble areas (nose and cheeks) during long summer days at the beach. The colors are bright, bold and the application is so much easier than squeezing zinc from a tube and rubbing it on their faces. They like to draw their own creations on their faces, too, which is always funny. So far no burning on their faces and no breaking of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Summer H.

customer_reviews.title: Wear Sunblock under
customer_reviews.text: I bought these thinking they would be great for my daughter. I didn't see any reviews that made me think these would be bad as a sunblock, but my daughter was so colorful, I couldn't tell if she was red or not. She loved being able to wear all kinds of different colors all day and enjoyed the different designs we came up with.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Schweitzer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely provides protection
customer_reviews.text: Worked as hoped for. Used for clown face paint for my kiddo. He sure didn’t get sunburnt that day lol. It smeared on his face just fine but wouldn’t use this for details for face painting. Getting it off was a little challenging. We used make up removing wipes and it didn’t come off completely.
customer_reviews.author: Denisse Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Works ok, colors are fun
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, some colors stand out better than others. The pink kinda blends into your skin quickly, especially if you're tan. The blue really pops though. I used this for softball tournaments in the summer to protect my nose and cheeks and it did an ok job. I didn't burn. BUT, it does wipe off easily if you touch your skin or sweat and does need to be reapplied often.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Fun way to cover the kids
customer_reviews.text: It’s colored zinc so it works. The colors are not as bright when you apply this, you really need to add several layers if you’d like it bright. This price is a bit high in my opinion. Works great as a fave paint option although it will smear easily.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: My kids enjoy using this
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kids to mark themselves up at swim meets. The black came broken but still usable and my son is sensitive to the red dye one and cant use it. The colored zinc can stain the skin for a few days but the kids had fun with it
customer_reviews.author: GSLeaderVA

customer_reviews.title: Is NOT for Sunscreen. DoNot Use on Children
customer_reviews.text: This Is NOT a sun screen. It only has 10% zinc and no SPF. It’s only for body paint. Our granddaughter’s face was terribly sunburnt and we had her face covered with this. After reading fine print we saw it’s Only for body paint. This is dangerous false labeling.
customer_reviews.author: C. higgins

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the sun
customer_reviews.text: Used Zinc as a child, these are a great substitute and affordable. They are however a bit hard to get off... my son and his friends love them great way to get them to wear sunblock
customer_reviews.author: VanMar

customer_reviews.title: Great "war paint" sunblock for Swim &Water Polo teams
customer_reviews.text: Quick, easy and fun bonding. We like Zinka too, but appreciated the variety of colors and that it was quicker, easier and less messy. We applied multiple times (10+) on 15 team mates with plenty to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Lenore S

customer_reviews.title: Great for swim team
customer_reviews.text: We used these for my kid’s swim team to draw team cheer messages. They also work great at blocking the sun. They will rub off on towels and clothes so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: A Dub

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the Sun!
customer_reviews.text: Bold, bright colors are EXTREMELY waterproof (to the point of needing some major scrubbing after time in the pool), and easy to apply. For once, my children didn't get annoyed at me sunscreening up their face. The green is a perfect match to the Hulk, so it was a big hit. Protected well too, kids were in the pool for over an hour. Just as a suggestion, Zalan, come up with some glittery colors too!
customer_reviews.author: S. Arroyo

customer_reviews.title: We love zinc sticks
customer_reviews.text: We love zinc sticks! We use them when going to a theme park or water park to identify our kids. We color their noses in whatever color they choose for the day and know to just "look for the blue kids". Many years ago when I was a YMCA camp counselor I would die zinc orange before our weekly field trip to the local pool so we always knew the orange kids were ours. This version is MUCH easier than that! We do have to reapply mid-day though as it rubs off which I didn't have to do many years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Cat mom

customer_reviews.title: Super fun and useful!
customer_reviews.text: These are fun! My 4 year old girl loves them! There’s plenty of color option in this pack. It goes on smoothly And doesn’t come off very fast in the water. We use them as kind of a “face paint” on the beach! It makes sun protection fun And unique for little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Tosha w.

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Black
customer_reviews.text: Reallt Good colors... but the black wont work!!! The tube wont turn up like the rest. It is stuck. Thats a big bummer because i was going to use it for football events. The rest of the colors are vibrant and long lasting though! Disapointed in the black tube. ¡¡¡¡UPDATE!!!! They got my review and sent me a whole new set to compensate for the broken black!!! Awesome customer service!!! Will be using these for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Macy Bernstein

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the kids to play with
customer_reviews.text: Fun for the kids to play with, it stains skin a little bit , but with a little bit of oil or other sunblock you can wipe it off
customer_reviews.author: Gakaross

customer_reviews.title: So much fun! Must have for pool fun!
customer_reviews.text: These are so fun! My daughter gets sunburned very easily on her face and these helped keep her coming back for more applications throughout her days of swimming. After I would make her face a butterfly or some other sillyness I had a line of children asking me to paint their face too.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Bright colors but broken
customer_reviews.text: The bright colors were exactly what I was wanting for my son...putting it on him was easy, too. I was however disappointed that 3 of the 8 zinc sticks had been broke off and wouldn't even roll up enough for one use. I was also hoping it might have stayed on longer--after jumping in and out of the pool a few times it had all smeared off.
customer_reviews.author: Alison R.

customer_reviews.title: Great sunblock
customer_reviews.text: The sunblock war paint has kept our guys burn free AND not complaining about sunscreen. Thanks! - FYI, Be careful though. The colors DON"T wash out of fabric....
customer_reviews.author: Bibi Reads, A LOT

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: I love the color assortment, but they are small and very wet so they rub off easily. Also stain skin and clothes and are completely not sweat resistant.
customer_reviews.author: kittykatt

customer_reviews.title: I love them
customer_reviews.text: I love them just wish there was more zinc in them they only have 10% I’m use to using 40%. But it’s better than white all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must purchase
customer_reviews.text: These things worked so good!!! Was at lake house and stayed in sun for about 7 hrs at a time and would reply about 3 times but stayed on very good and kids wanted a new face paint everytime it was time to zink back up.. well worth buying
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use
customer_reviews.text: We used for swim meets, the girls enjoyed using it, but was a little hard to get off afterwards. Lots of scrubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Txmama

customer_reviews.title: Pos
customer_reviews.text: Stained my sons clothes and smeared all over once on. Never actually dried.
customer_reviews.author: Jessa Zwack

customer_reviews.title: Love these. My kids have so much fun picking ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these. My kids have so much fun picking out the color they want. Fair warning....they are like chapstick. If you leave them in the sun, they will melt. Stick the in the ice chest to avoid this. These are currently unavailable for purchase and am so bummed because my kids want more.
customer_reviews.author: AMBER JONES

customer_reviews.title: Bringing 80's back
customer_reviews.text: My daughter spends most of her life in the pool. We were bringing back my childhood with these. She and her swim team had a great time putting these on. The stick is much better than the tube as it's less messy. The colors were fantastic and very vibrant and an added bonus - they saved her cheekbones from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy W

customer_reviews.title: Some colors broken
customer_reviews.text: The ones that worked were great. But three of the colors wouldn’t twist up out of the tube. Seemed like the mechanism wasn’t connected to the inner part. They just keep turning.
customer_reviews.author: D B

customer_reviews.title: Stains everything it touches!
customer_reviews.text: Smears and stains everything it touches. Thought it was a fun idea for the kids to enjoy putting in sunscreen. Mess. Stained boat cushions.
customer_reviews.author: MichaT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for camp as face paint. The added sunscreen is cool as well!
customer_reviews.author: Bucknutter

customer_reviews.title: Great for Face Painting!
customer_reviews.text: Lasts but you can still wash it off. We used it for a party where we were face-painting, and then we use them for the beach. Our kids look crazy, but at least they are wearing sunscreen. It becomes quite the thing to bust these out, let the kids paint their own faces.
customer_reviews.author: J9LP

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the sun.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cool product. The kids LOVED them! No more complaining about putting sunblock on their faces. They loved making their own tribe designs on themselves. I’d buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Stein

customer_reviews.title: It smears easily if rubbed
customer_reviews.text: Works well, just be careful not to smug it. It smears easily if rubbed.
customer_reviews.author: Lolli

customer_reviews.title: My boys LOVE these colored sunscreen sticks
customer_reviews.text: My boys LOVE these colored sunscreen sticks! They work perfectly for "war paint" for swim meets! They do tend to melt in the sun, so I leave mine in the cooler bag on really hot days. They were a big hit at the pool this summer, though!
customer_reviews.author: MomofBoys

customer_reviews.title: LOVE These!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these! Have used them for many years with our kids at the pool. Perfect for fun and to keep from getting burned under the eyes and nose. They last a couple of season for us!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't seen these zinc colored sunsceeen sticks since I was 8 years old. I was so excited that they are still around & immediately had to buy them. They were waterproof and fun for people of all ages!
customer_reviews.author: Malorie

customer_reviews.title: Good buy if you don’t want to waste your time arguing with your kids about sun protection
customer_reviews.text: My kids brought them to wakeboard camp and it was a hit! Everyone loved it (and parents didn’t have to spend time or energy to fight with the kids about sun screen.)
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: I ended up doing face painting with them for the kids and their cousin because they loved the colors
customer_reviews.text: Got these for our beach trip to Greece for my 3 year old and 1 year old. They were a huge hit! I ended up doing face painting with them for the kids and their cousin because they loved the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super fun in the sun, but it does run once the kids start to sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear Corey

customer_reviews.title: No more gooey fingers
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter for Jr. Lifeguard. She loved them. No more gooey fingers. So easy and fun to apply. She used the red for lipstick. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: SD Mom

customer_reviews.title: which is nice for clean up but not for the sun protection ...
customer_reviews.text: Zinc content is low. Product smears/wipes off quickly... which is nice for clean up but not for the sun protection it's supposed to be offering.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a kids pool party, was really awesome and fun, and washed right off with soap and water!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa J Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were stolen from my mail box! I want tore- order.
customer_reviews.author: marian a scott

customer_reviews.title: Effective but colors stain
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love these but most of the colors stained my kids faces. Otherwise, they get the job done for a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: GMR

customer_reviews.title: Close enough to zinka!
customer_reviews.text: What I loved about this is I could just put it directly on his face. Great for the pool, beach and sporting events
customer_reviews.author: Nicole I Branch

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids to use
customer_reviews.text: Worked well in our carribean cruise. Fun for kids to use!
customer_reviews.author: Calimom

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Bring it back, please!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this!! I purchased three sets for the summer at the pool and am very disappointed to see that it's no longer available. Hope it will be again, soon!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Kob

customer_reviews.title: The kids love the colors
customer_reviews.text: The kids love the colors, but not really water resistant comes off very quickly and easily once they hit the water.
customer_reviews.author: Mariposa Sivage

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Colored zinc in a lip stick style packaging, bright colors, keeps lips from burning while in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: STACEY C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fun for the kids!
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased these for a vacation to Barbados. First time ever, we didn't have to beg our girls to sunscreen their faces. And it really works!
customer_reviews.author: ParkinNYC

customer_reviews.title: Daughters love them
customer_reviews.text: My daughters ages 10-15, love these sunscreen face sticks. They paint fun stuff on their face and it protects them from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Runnindherd

customer_reviews.title: I got it on time
customer_reviews.text: we are using for sun protection at the windsurf race
customer_reviews.author: DEMET

customer_reviews.title: fun product. we use this all the time
customer_reviews.text: fun product. we use this all the time. keeps sun off the eyes well.
customer_reviews.author: JMMaser

customer_reviews.title: ... of these for my daughters soccer team and they love it.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a few of these for my daughters soccer team and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: MarcusMiller6158

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Sunblock
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we wanted! GREAT sunblock! Fun for the kids to use for sports and the pool alike!
customer_reviews.author: jax

customer_reviews.title: She loves all the great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses them for Junior Life Guards. She loves all the great colors
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Great sunscreen that the kids love to use!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sons to use during sporting events. The whole team started using it in their team colors. Also used it for camp face paint. Great sunscreen and lots of fun colors. Love this stuff!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Ashley Beagles

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Way too light and they wash off and start to look smudged on your face right away
customer_reviews.author: charis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We had tons of fun with these, with the whole family on vacation. Colours are all great and opaque.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Poole

customer_reviews.title: Smears Easy
customer_reviews.text: Nice colors but they do not stay put. I bought this for my children to have extra protection on their nose and under their eyes as that is where they tend to burn. Though this would be a nice and thick for added protection. They are not as thick as you would hope and one forgotten touch and it is a smeared mess. It is also really hard to remove. I found that you need an oil based substance to remove it and not have to scrub.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Belle

customer_reviews.title: I wish it didn't rub off so easy. But my kids love putting it on
customer_reviews.text: I wish it didn't rub off so easy. But my kids love putting it on, so it is a great way keep their noses covered!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: fantastic, fun and stays on through hours of swim
customer_reviews.text: fantastic,fun and stays on through hours of swim, sun and play!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Lockman

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to remove
customer_reviews.text: Great colors and lots of fun for the grandchildren. Extremely difficult to remove. Will not use again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan R

customer_reviews.title: Fun and lasts
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a music festival later this summer and when I tried it I didn't expect it to last as long as it did. This is waterproof, sweat proof, and rub proof. It lasts forever and is great for long day wear. It's a lot of fun and I can't wait to use it all summer long!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to wash off skin when you are done at the beach/pool.
customer_reviews.text: Thought these would be fun for the kids, but it was impossible to remove.
customer_reviews.author: JenJoy

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the Sun!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pack for my daughter in the beginning of the summer for her and her friends to use as Junior Lifeguards. She is also part of a swim team, and sunblock and skin care is very important! The different colors make using this a lot of fun for everyone, and it's a relief for those of us concerned about skin damage from the sun. Fun product!
customer_reviews.author: J Maeda

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff, works!  Just be prepared to scrub!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is very fair skinned so we sometimes have to go to extremes to prevent sunburn. We used these for her face and they do work. While it is not discrete at all, at least you can have some fun with it! I did not experience staining as some others have, but sometimes if we put it in and didn't wear it long enough for sweat or the water to wear off, then it was very tough to get off. To the point of scrubbing it so hard her cheeks became red and irritated. So that would be my only concern, but as long as you let it wear some before removal, all is good.
customer_reviews.author: Preston Family est. 2006Top Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Works great, fun colors and the color/zinc comes off easily
customer_reviews.text: Works great, fun colors and the color/zinc comes off easily. I bought for my husband for our boat just to have a little fun because he has a couple of spots he burned last year that now burn really easily. Does the trick and you can see if it starts to come off so he is always protected/blocked from the sun. Will also be fun for various social events on our lake. Last week he looked like Braveheart with the blue! :-)
customer_reviews.author: juju

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it, but smears color easily
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it, but it smears easily. We applied their regular stick sunscreen and put this on the most prominent areas below the eyes. I applied on top of makeup without any other sunscreen. Both smeared but offered sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Wine2Five

customer_reviews.title: Colorful, just didnt get all the colors.
customer_reviews.text: The colors are very bright and fun, the product itself feels good on the face...BUT my package left out blue and gave me 2 purple instead. Normally this wouldnt be a huge deal for this type of product bc its sunscreen...but I specifically ordered this package so I could have an array of colors including blue for a project im working on...Not sure why or how my package was altered.
customer_reviews.author: Turnip

customer_reviews.title: Zinc would work if it would roll up
customer_reviews.text: While I like zinc for my kids to keep them from getting sunburned. I’ve ordered this product twice and had defective sticks in each package. Several sticks do not twist up so they are unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Dpinklet

customer_reviews.title: Not one sunburned face!
customer_reviews.text: We just got back from a beach vacation with 4 grandkids. Not a problem applying because they loved all the colors to choose from! I liked the fact I could see when to reapply. I'm ordering more for the pool. Just note you need to remove with baby wipes or baby oil.
customer_reviews.author: B. Burriss

customer_reviews.title: It is going to be great for spirit days during the school year too (and ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish they had a pencil version of these too. My son loves getting face painted - so after he puts sunscreen on (he is 10 - he was never enthusiastic about sunscreen) - I use these and the zinka tubes to facepaint something for camp (really simple on one cheek). It is going to be great for spirit days during the school year too (and football games for my older kids)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have fun and Protect from Sunburn
customer_reviews.text: Bought it because we were on houseboat for 7 days and in water all day. This is fun for kids .and grownups to paint ourselves like warriors .and in turn keep us from increased sun burn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright sunscreen sticks for summer
customer_reviews.text: Great sunscreen sticks with fun colors. My kids had a lot of fun using these sunscreen sticks during the summer swim season. They loved the bright colors and how easy it went on. A little harder to get off than most sunscreens but extra time spent in the shower helped.
customer_reviews.author: BookNotesEW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product it stay on your skin the whole day ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product it stay on your skin the whole day in a pol of beach. But it stain your cloths and does not come off so just watch for that and keep it in your skin. My whole family used it at the cruise. And last for ever. We made design and wrote on our skin we all love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheyla

customer_reviews.title: Zinc face paint
customer_reviews.text: Stays on all day. So you know it’s working. Love that’s it has ALL the colors. So kids can pick what want. Captain America: red white blue. Butterfly: pink purple yellow. I use I like face paint!
customer_reviews.author: M. Moss

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved this and used it like facepaint. It stayed on pretty well in a swim, and when it does rinse or rub off, you can see because of the color.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Howarth

customer_reviews.title: fantastic. but one broke during shipping
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I purchased one set, tried them out while surfing, and they worked phenomenally!! This second set is great too, but the white when opened broke in the middle :( probably during shipping, but i still love the product.
customer_reviews.author: Ky

customer_reviews.title: Great bright colors.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best colored zinc sticks I've found. It does help to let them dry a bit before swimming, but even on top of other sunscreen they held up pretty well. Great bright colors.
customer_reviews.author: shopper mom

customer_reviews.title: Stains skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and sent them to my daughter and her cabin mates at sleep away camp. They enjoyed using them, but this product stained their skin, even after washing. Last year I purchased Zinka brand, and there was no staining.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy C.

customer_reviews.title: Kids LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love having these to draw designs on themselves and each other. Colors are good.
customer_reviews.author: Mel T

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME! I use them in place of lipstick
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME!I use them in place of lipstick. Cheaper and stay on really well!
customer_reviews.author: Janina

customer_reviews.title: What a fun way to get kids to put on their sunblock
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge hit at both Boy Scout and Girl Scout camp this summer! What a fun way to get kids to put on their sunblock!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hellickson

customer_reviews.title: Spf and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Best price. Super fun! Made for fun vacation pics and protected our faces exceptionally well!! Much better than the liquidy tube zinc!
customer_reviews.author: Fashionista

customer_reviews.title: love sun protection and fun in one!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun for the kids with sun protection! I always have to fite my kids to put sunscreen on their face. With these sticks, they beg me to put on sunscreen. Only downfall is it rubs off easily (like regular zinc does) and can stain clothes
customer_reviews.author: deb l

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves this stuff! Stays on,
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this stuff! Stays on, during lacrosse and has a variety of colors to help match up with school spirit
customer_reviews.author: Ky’s mom

customer_reviews.title: A product that works!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding color that stays on you lips and protects Rays from the sun. Plus, it looks reall cool!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Johnson

customer_reviews.title: A blast from the past
customer_reviews.text: Just like the colored zinc of the 90s. Fun! Washes off very easily though.
customer_reviews.author: Mythreekids

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works great...and very fun But I'm not sure about it is safe chemical...
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: These are great. They stay on and can be used for ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They stay on and can be used for fun days at camp or the beach or even as lipstick for the kids
customer_reviews.author: HSM

customer_reviews.title: pool party face paints
customer_reviews.text: Got them quickly, have been a blast for my daughter and her friends all summer.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly G

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The product is not a good one. It stained my grandchildren's face.
customer_reviews.author: These are all free items for you！！！

customer_reviews.title: Teen son loved these
customer_reviews.text: My son was so stoked to get this 'retro' gift. Apparently, what's retro is now cool again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gaeir

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: wish it was a less transparent. I wanted a little heavier color for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Daphny

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Goes on easy, but also comes off too easy all over clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Angella Niemer

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Nice selection of color options, and great protection! I've been using this stuff since I was a kid :) NOTE: Would have gave it 5 Stars had it maybe came with some sort of convenient travel case or bag.
customer_reviews.author: SanDiego858

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Music Festivals
customer_reviews.text: I love the smooth application and bold colours. The only con is that it takes a good deal of scrubbing to get the stains off your skin if you have worn it all day.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn

product_meta.title: Zalan Zinc Stick - Colored Zinc Sticks for Face and Body Paint - Set of 8
product_meta.description: Sold as a set in a tray of 8 assorted colors. Comes with white, black, yellow, green, blue, purple, pink, and red
feature_bullets: Perfect for face paint, body paint, decoration, sporting events, music festivals
Comes with white, black, yellow, green, blue, purple, pink, and red
Water resistant. To remove, use a diaper wipe or makeup remover.
